pr_title: Add AlterISR RPC and use it for ISR modifications

timeline.message: Checking in RPCs and stubbing out basic functionality
Update the ISR from the controller
Start working on broker-side of AlterIsr
Add throttle time to AlterIsr, fix error counts

Broker to controller AlterIsr fixes

* Make AlterIsr block until Controller process it fully
* Batch AlterIsr requests for a short while on broker side
* Don't attempt to restrict to a single in-flight request

timeline.bodyText: With KIP-500, I imagine we could end up with other cases where we end up using optimistic concurrency control. Does it make sense to make this error a little more generic? Maybe INVALID_UPDATE_VERSION or something like that..

timeline.author: hachikuji

timeline.message: PR feedback and progress on unit tests
Add back ReplicaManager's ISR propagation thread
Add some debug logging for test
Make sure to always send LeaderAndIsr after AlterIsr
Clear the pending ISR state for certain errors
Let Partition handle LeaderAndIsr even if epoch is unchanged
Better logging for ISR updates, allow leader to retry in some cases
Clear pending ISR state after unknown controller error
Cover more error cases, some cleanup

timeline.bodyText: This error message should be less specific
timeline.author: mumrah
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -325,7 +326,8 @@
     UNSTABLE_OFFSET_COMMIT(88, "There are unstable offsets that need to be cleared.", UnstableOffsetCommitException::new),
     THROTTLING_QUOTA_EXCEEDED(89, "The throttling quota has been exceeded.", ThrottlingQuotaExceededException::new),
     PRODUCER_FENCED(90, "There is a newer producer with the same transactionalId " +
-            "which fences the current one.", ProducerFencedException::new);
+            "which fences the current one.", ProducerFencedException::new),
+    INVALID_UPDATE_VERSION(91, "The given ISR version was out-of-date.", InvalidUpdateVersionException::new);

timeline.message:
Revert "Back something out"

This reverts commit 8c9183b9425f72c7834015cf91e9a887358d2210.

Lots of updates from Jason's review

* Get broker epoch from KafkaController instead of ZK
* Add additional fields to AlterIsr response
* Update ISR in Partition from AlterIsr response
* Controller no longer sends LeaderAndIsr, now sends UpdateMetadata
More PR feedback, mostly style stuff

Make sure we set throttle time on the response

Also fix some short circuit bugs in controller
Use a queue instead of map inside AlterIsrManager
Cleanup and adding more unit tests

More PR feedback

* Lots of cleanup, logging improvements
* Changes to AlterIsr RPC field names
* Consolidate on maximal ISR name
* Introduce sealed trait for different ISR states
* Tweaks to some error handling

More PR feedback

* Cleaned up expand/shrink ISR methods
* Style stuff
* Logging stuff

Next round of PR feedback

* Make AlterIsr idempotent in the controller
* Tweak some error handling
* Add a few tests
* Style feedback
